Potential 1.title: Doubling Down
Potential 1.description: Talent Expedited Delivery improved: Ultimate Energy gain +2.

Potential 4.title: Very Experienced
Potential 4.description: Ultimate Thunderlance: Final Shock improved: Ultimate Energy cost -15%.

Potential 5.title: Carrot and Sharp Stick
Potential 5.description: When returning Thunderlances or Thunderlances EX hit an Electric Susceptible enemy, DMG multiplier is increased to 1.15 times the original.
